lead_paragraph: The Italian oil giant is the latest energy company to be hit by sharply lower crude prices, which have slashed revenue and led to asset write-downs.

headline.print_headline: Hit by Oil Price Fall, Italy’s Eni Reports $9.4 Billion Loss
headline.main: Eni, Hit by Falling Oil Prices, Reports $9.4 Billion Loss

snippet: The Italian oil giant is the latest energy company to be hit by sharply lower crude prices, which have slashed revenue and led to asset write-downs.
